thumb.title: Graveside [original song, Vocaloid, Haruka/Akito/Sarah]
thumb.description: LyricsWalking back from a grave,Arm around a shoulder,Faces are in a haze,Speaking wisely like someone older.If I close my eyes I cannot recall you;Pass the photograph, frozen in time,Like Dorian Grey or Peter Pan.Crying all through the wake,Can it get any harder,Tears fall down on the cake,Take me home please, well, someone ought to.If I close my eyes I cannot recall you;Pass the photograph, frozen in time,Like Dorian Grey or Peter Pan.I see you're dead now.
